home.newsletterDescription: Check out the latest additions to our lineup and what to expect this year.
home.newsletterFullText: We are thrilled to announce several new artists joining LoveUfestival 2025! Stay tuned for more updates and exclusive interviews with the performers. Don't miss out on the fun and excitement!

content.description: The ❤️U Festival is for (new) students in the Utrecht region and complements UIT.

content.carValue: Parking at P+R Papendorp with online ticket or on-site (PIN ONLY, FIRST COME FIRST SERVED).
content.shuttleBusValue: Free from Utrecht Central between 12:00–19:00 (going) and from 21:00 (return).
content.taxiValue: Follow the signs at Strijkviertel, De Meern.

content.lockersAvailable: Lockers are available at the festival. Suitable for 3 to 4 coats.
content.unlimitedAccess: You can open and close your locker unlimited times.
content.noOnlineReservation: Note: You cannot reserve lockers online.

content.medicationValue: Allowed with a doctor's note. May be kept in custody at the first aid station.
content.leavingValue: Not allowed due to safety. Please enjoy the festival area!

content.description: GLU students have special privileges thanks to their golden wristband:

toilet.title: Toilet
toilet.desc: Restrooms are available here for your convenience.

entranceExit.title: Entrance / Exit
entranceExit.desc: This is the main entrance and exit of the festival grounds.

firstAid.title: First Aid
firstAid.desc: Need help? Visit the first aid station for medical assistance.

locker.title: Locker
locker.desc: Store your belongings safely in a locker.

merchandise.title: Merchandise
merchandise.desc: Get your official festival merchandise here!

stage.clickForFullLineup: Click for full line-up in the Events tab!

eventsData.name: Armin van Buuren
eventsData.description: Five-time “World’s No. 1 DJ” and trance icon, Armin delivers euphoric, high-energy sets that have headlined festivals from Tomorrowland to Ultra. His uplifting melodies and impeccable mixing keep crowds dancing for hours.

eventsData.name: Martin Garrix
eventsData.description: Broke through as a teenager with “Animals,” Martin Garrix has become one of the biggest names in EDM. His anthemic big-room tracks and stadium-sized drops make him a festival favorite across Europe.

eventsData.name: Kensington
eventsData.description: Rotterdam-born indie rock quintet known for soaring choruses and driving guitar riffs. Hits like “Streets” and “Riddles” showcase their knack for arena-ready hooks and emotionally charged lyricism.

eventsData.name: Within Temptation
eventsData.description: Symphonic metal pioneers fronted by Sharon den Adel. Their cinematic soundscapes and operatic vocals (think “Ice Queen,” “Mother Earth”) translate into dramatic, visually stunning festival performances.

eventsData.name: De Staat
eventsData.description: Experimental rock outfit from Nijmegen, blending funky grooves with angular guitar work and theatrical stagecraft. Tracks like “Witch Doctor” and “Down Town” highlight their genre-bending approach and infectious energy.

eventsData.name: Chef’Special
eventsData.description: A four-piece from Haarlem mixing funk, pop, rock and hip-hop. Their upbeat, genre-fluid sound on songs like “Amigo” and “In Your Arms” makes for joyous, dance-floor-friendly live shows.

eventsData.name: Navarone
eventsData.description: Utrecht’s hard-hitting rock four-piece, delivering riff-driven anthems and dynamic vocals. With a live reputation for raw intensity, they’re tailor-made for late-night main stages.

eventsData.name: Dotan
eventsData.description: Folk-pop singer-songwriter whose intimate voice and acoustic arrangements (notably on “Home”) have earned him platinum sales and sell-out shows. His heartfelt storytelling connects deeply on festival acoustic stages.

eventsData.name: Eefje de Visser
eventsData.description: Indie-pop artist crafting atmospheric, electronic-tinged songs. Her hypnotic vocals and lush production (as heard on “Ongeveer”) create a dreamlike vibe perfect for twilight festival slots.

eventsData.name: Froukje
eventsData.description: Breakthrough pop singer Froukje Veenstra combines candid lyrics with catchy, synth-driven hooks. Since her 2021 debut, she’s become a voice of her generation—ideal for mid-day festival stages.

eventsData.name: Spinvis
eventsData.description: Erik de Jong performs under the moniker Spinvis, crafting poetic, collage-like songs that blend spoken-word snippets, lo-fi electronics and wistful pop. Since his debut album in 2002—recorded in his attic—he’s become a fixture of Dutch indie, renowned for narratives that feel both intimate and surreal. His live shows turn everyday observations into shared, dreamlike experiences.
